page.title: 09Traffic survey the results
page.content: The road that passes outside the school is the B3257 which connects the A30 at Plusha with the A388 at Taylor Shop.It crosses the B3254 at Condons Shop.Apart from a kilometre length of the B3254 which crosses the most NW square of the grid it is the main road in the grid. The survey was completed by 6 groups of 4 children to a group working on different time slices during the day. Two counting the Eastward flow and two the Westward. We found no significant difference in the direction of flow.The traffic in the morning was much heavier in the morning even allowing for the shorter afternoon session.We thought this was because in the morning more people would be on their way somewhere and we would have gone home before their return in the evening.
